channel.title: Looking for a particular client:
channel.description:
I think regex made it, it was pretty funny.
Basically it would just yell out people's HP. If you were in the wildy, it would say something like: usernamegoeshere has 12/40 hp!
It was funny watching them say, "How you do that?"
Does anyone have this and willing to update it? lol[br][size=1]Posted at: May 06, 2006, 01:36:49 pm[/size][hr]No one has it? Damn :( Who wants to make me one ;) :D lol
